TextView.android:text: Welcome to the HRV Poincaré Plotter! This application connects to your Polar H7 device and relays useful information on your heart, as well as rendering a Poincaré format plot to better view this data! Take note that the larger the cloud of points, the higher variability you have! Any plot points that appear outside of the cloud may suggest irregularities in your heart beat, or device issues. Issues may be caused by the device not being properly fixed to your chest! If such irregularities continue to occur while your device is properly fixed onto your chest, it may be worth visiting a doctor and relaying your concerns. I hope you find this application useful for better understanding your heart during every day tasks and exercise
